Name: Summon Jaguar
Desc:
Summons Jaguars to fight together. The Jaguars attack your target first. You can command them to use [Jaguar skills]. The Jaguar skills target the Boss monster with the highest Max HP within range before everyone else. If there's no Boss monster, then Jaguars attack in your facing direction.
While Jaguars are summoned, use this skill again with the Down key to keep the main Jaguar in place while fighting.
The fixed Jaguar attacks a Boss monster with the highest Max HP within range first and moves back to your location if it becomes too far away from you.
Use Jaguar Rider to ride a Jaguar.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 20. Summons a Jaguar that attacks up to 6 enemies at 170% damage
The Jaguar attacks with a 15% chance of casting the Another Bite debuff that stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 20 sec.
Another Bite: [Final Attack Typed Skill] Attacking enemies inflicted by the debuff with Crossbow skills performs an additional attack at 70% damage per stack.
Cooldown: 1 sec.
[Passive Effects: Critical Damage +8%, Status Resistance +30]
